title: Text Selection Management
description:
TN_INPUT_SELECT_TEXT is used to manage a selection of 

texts. This must be set *.IN_TYPE = 2.

180 Version 1.21

Chapter 11. Telnet-Vision

The item will be provided as *.in_X and *.in_Y. Every entry line can be 

provided with a title text. With *.in_Title_Y_Ofset and *.in_Title_X_Ofset 

the position relative to the element coordinates is expressed. The color 

can be determined with *.by_Title_Attr, and the text by *.st_Title_String. If 

a tool tip should appear at the element *. st_Input_ToolTip the text hast to 

be specifed.

The selection of texts will be handed over in *.st_Input_Data. The text 

element should be separated from each other by the character '#'.

If the Element has the focus, by using the spacebar (space) can be 

changed between the individual texts. The text-element is connected by 

means *.st_Input_Mask, meaning that the output text length are afected 

later.

By pressing the Enter / Return key the input text is issued at 

*.st_Input_String and *.bo_Input_Entered ist set to TRUE. The input fag 

must be reset after receive by the user.
name: TN_INPUT_SELECT_TEXT

input.name: Xus_TN_SCREEN
input.description: Screen interface for the text selection.

input.name: Xus_TN_INPUT_CONTROL
input.description: Control structure for managing input options.

input.name: in_Type
input.description: Type of the input selection; must be set to 2.

input.name: in_Y
input.description: Y-coordinate positioning for the input selection.

input.name: in_X
input.description: X-coordinate positioning for the input selection.

input.name: by_Attr_mF
input.description: Attribute value for the foreground color.

input.name: by_Attr_oF
input.description: Attribute value for the background color.

input.name: st_Input_ToolTip
input.description: Tooltip text for the input element.

input.name: in_Title_Y_Ofset
input.description: Y-offset for the title text relative to the input element.

input.name: in_Title_X_Ofset
input.description: X-offset for the title text relative to the input element.

input.name: st_Title_String
input.description: Title text to display for this input.

output.name: st_Input_String
output.description: Output string of the current input selection.

output.name: bo_Input_Entered
output.description: Boolean indicating if the input was entered (set to TRUE when Enter/Return is pressed).

output.name: st_Input_Mask
output.description: The mask affecting the output text length.
